title.template:
Create a compelling, SEO-optimized title for this image suitable for stock photography.

Requirements:
- Maximum {max_length} characters
- Descriptive and specific
- Include key visual elements
- Professional and marketable
- No generic words like "image", "photo", "picture"
- Draw inspiration from existing successful stock photos or photos by user DannyJPN that have similar visual elements and composition

{context_section}Return ONLY the title, no other text.

description.template:
Create a detailed, SEO-optimized description for this image suitable for stock photography.

Requirements:
- Maximum {max_length} characters
- Describe key visual elements, mood, setting
- Include relevant details for searchability
- Professional and marketable tone
- Expand on concepts from the title
- Draw inspiration from existing successful stock photos or photos by user DannyJPN that have similar titles and visual themes

{title_section}{context_section}Return ONLY the description, no other text.

keywords.template:
Generate {count} relevant, SEO-optimized keywords for this image suitable for stock photography.

Requirements:
- PREFER single-word keywords (e.g., "sunset", "mountain", "urban")
- Multi-word keywords are allowed when necessary for specificity (e.g., "golden hour", "aerial view")
- Mix of broad and specific terms
- Include objects, concepts, moods, colors, styles, abstractions
- Avoid meaningless generic terms like "image", "photo", "picture"
- Keywords should be searchable and relevant
- Draw inspiration from existing successful stock photos or photos by user DannyJPN that have similar titles and descriptions
- Separate with commas

{title_section}{description_section}Return ONLY {count} keywords separated by commas, no other text.

categories.template:
Select the {max_categories} most appropriate categor{category_word} for this image from the {photobank} categories below.

Requirements:
- Choose categories that best match the image content and theme
- Draw inspiration from existing successful stock photos or photos by user DannyJPN that have similar titles and descriptions

Available categories:
{categories_list}

{title_section}{description_section}Return ONLY {max_categories} category name{category_plural} separated by commas, no other text.

editorial.template:
Analyze if this image contains editorial content that would require editorial licensing.

Editorial content includes:
- Recognizable people (not models in commercial contexts)
- News events, protests, accidents
- Trademarked products prominently featured
- Copyrighted artwork or logos
- Private property with identifying features

Commercial content includes:
- Professional models in commercial settings
- Generic objects, nature, concepts
- Stock photography scenarios

{title_section}{description_section}Return ONLY 'YES' if editorial content, 'NO' if commercial content.

_bw.name: Black and white
_bw.title_modifier: Adjust title to reflect black and white / monochrome / grayscale nature. Keep original subject, add 'black and white', 'monochrome', 'B&W', or 'grayscale' where appropriate.
_bw.description_modifier: Adjust description to emphasize monochrome aesthetic, contrast, tones, and timeless quality. Mention lack of color as artistic choice.
_bw.keywords_modifier: Add keywords: black-and-white, monochrome, grayscale, bw, contrast, tones. Remove color-specific keywords.

_negative.name: Color negative
_negative.title_modifier: Adjust title to reflect inverted/negative color effect. Add 'negative', 'inverted', or 'reversed colors' where appropriate.
_negative.description_modifier: Adjust description to emphasize surreal inverted color palette, artistic effect, and unique visual impact of color reversal.
_negative.keywords_modifier: Add keywords: negative, inverted, reversed-colors, surreal, artistic-effect, color-inversion. Adjust color keywords to reflect inverted palette.

_sharpen.name: Sharpened
_sharpen.title_modifier: Adjust title to emphasize crisp detail and clarity. Add 'sharp', 'detailed', 'crisp', or 'high-definition' where appropriate.
_sharpen.description_modifier: Adjust description to highlight enhanced sharpness, fine details, crystal-clear quality, and professional precision.
_sharpen.keywords_modifier: Add keywords: sharp, sharpened, detailed, crisp, clarity, high-definition, enhanced-detail, precision.

_misty.name: Misty/foggy effect
_misty.title_modifier: Adjust title to reflect ethereal misty/foggy atmosphere. Add 'misty', 'foggy', 'hazy', or 'dreamy' where appropriate.
_misty.description_modifier: Adjust description to emphasize soft ethereal atmosphere, fog/mist effect, dreamy quality, and mysterious ambiance.
_misty.keywords_modifier: Add keywords: misty, foggy, hazy, fog, mist, vapor, steam, ethereal, dreamy, atmospheric, soft-focus.

_blurred.name: Gaussian blur
_blurred.title_modifier: Adjust title to reflect soft blurred artistic effect. Add 'blurred', 'soft', 'abstract', or 'dreamy' where appropriate.
_blurred.description_modifier: Adjust description to emphasize soft blur effect, abstract quality, dreamy atmosphere, and artistic interpretation.
_blurred.keywords_modifier: Add keywords: blurred, blur, soft-focus, gaussian-blur, abstract, dreamy, soft, artistic-blur, motion.
